arabic: لَّا يُسۡمِنُ وَلَا يُغۡنِي مِن جُوعٖ
footnotes: Hakileti nafuu yoyote katika mwili, wala hakiondoi njaa.

version.title: Swahili translation - Ali Muhsen Alberwany
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Swahili by Ali Muhsen Alberwany

meta.transliteration: lā yus'minu walā yugh'nī min jūʿin
